title: crazy font promo video; shown at typecon 08?
content:
hi all,

i remember seeing a crazy video at typecon last year (possibly as part of one of the panels) that had been created to promo a font release. it featured an old couple, and made little sense. i can't remember for the life of me who showed it, can anyone help me out? i'll even buy you a brew at typecon 09 :)

-jonno
author: someonesplendid

comments.content: I've got a run-down of the videos shown at [ATypI08](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023200028/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/atypi%E2%80%9908-the-old-and-the-new/) on [The FontFeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023200028/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/atypi08-typophile-film-fest-4/), but I don't know if the program was the same. Check the list, maybe you'll recognise it?
Typophile Film Fest didn't run at TypeCon last year. So the video in question would not necessarily have been part of the Fest at ATypI.

It was Mike Cina from YWFT.

[Absent Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023200028/http:/vimeo.com/1131210) from [YouWorkForThem](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023200028/http:/vimeo.com/youworkforthem) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023200028/http:/vimeo.com/).

Cheers!
thanks fredrico - there's a beer waiting for you in atlanta :)
